p:
State-level Mexico hospitalization data come from the Subsistema Automatizado de Egresos Hospitalarios (SAEH) collected by the Sistema Nacional de Información en Salud (SINAIS) and overseen by Secretaría de Salud. We take data from all cases of bronchiolitis (ICD-10 codes J21.0, J21.1, J21.8, J21.9), a serious respiratory tract infection primarily caused by RSV
38 (Supplementary Table 8). Data were summed over the week to match the US data and reflect the generation time of RSV. Mexico data cover all years from 2000 to 2014.
